import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from "axios" const TodoList = () => { const[todos, setTodos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getTodos(); }, []); const getTodos = async() => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:6000/todos') setTodos(response.data) } return (
Awesome Todo List
    {todos.map((todo, index) => (
  • Vestibulum at eros
    • ))} {/*
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
    • */}
) } export default TodoList
